name: Gate Explorer Alpha
description:
Super Early Access to the Tech Demo.

Features...

  • Travel to 1,000,000,000 worlds (extendable to 2,000,000,000)
  • 2 world types (more planned)
  • Placeholder objects to test placement

Download the latest demo of the game so far, with future updates coming soon.

Remember, it is an very early released.

It would be great to get any feeedback via twitter.com/johnstamford
